column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Jennifer - Thank you for the great review. We truly appreciate it. I'm glad you said yes to your friend's offer to try us out. For some Houstonians we're an entirely new dining concept
column2: so we're always pleased to hear when our fare hits home. Please spread the word
column3: as word-of-mouth advertising is the best advertising there is! We appreciate you.
